schema.description: Statistics of EVPN ping and trace tests.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-average.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

probes.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

probe.description: Statistics of get the response result of a single packet in an EVPN VPWS ping test.

sequence.description: Serial number of a test packet received by a certain hop.

replier.description: Reply address in a received response packet.

data-bytes.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either success or timeout.

is-delete.description: Deletion flag indicating whether to delete test results.

vpws-trace-result.description: Statistics of test result of a certain hop in the test path.

hops.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

replier.description: Reply address of the related hop in a test.

ds-address.description: Downstream address of the related hop in a test.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either success or timeout.

is-delete.description: Deletion flag indicating whether to delete test results.

diagnostic-tools_schema.description: Diagnosis tool, limited to ping and trace.
